original_text: The Lord's Spirit began to give Samson strength when he was living in Mahaneh Dan. That place was between Zorah and Eshtaol.
korean_text: 소라와 에스다올 사이 마하네단에서 여호와의 영이 그를 움직이기 시작하셨더라

sentences.original_text: The Lord's Spirit began to give Samson strength
sentences.korean_translation: 주님의 영이 삼손에게 힘을 주기 시작했다

sentences.original_text: when he was living in Mahaneh Dan
That place was between Zorah and Eshtaol
sentences.korean_translation: 그 장소는 소라와 에스다올 사이에 있었다
